Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 5 % of the normal level .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Disease":

1. Normal level: This entity represents the typical or expected level of something, in this case, the level of something in the body.
2. Disease: This entity represents a condition that impairs or disrupts the normal functioning of the body or mind, such as a illness or infection.

So, the sentence "5 % of the normal level" can be interpreted as "5% of the typical or expected level of something in the body."
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to "Disease" in the given paragraph:

1. Disease: This entity represents a condition that impairs or disrupts the normal functioning of the body or mind, such as a illness or infection.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Disease":

| Disease |
| --- |
| Disease |
